Description: Fragment of neck and flattened handle to moderate turn of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine orange-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Type series: KT118 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Ink, reading of text. Names, Kallidamas, Anaxandros.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (304)
